name: Reeled In - Catch Those Ridiculous Fish
name_original: Reeled In - Catch Those Ridiculous Fish
description:
Use your state of the art suction cup harpoon gun to reel in as many fish as you can in 2 minutes. 3 different power ups will aid your in your quest for the highest score in Reeled In. Controls are easy to understand, simply touch and drag to aim your harpoon gun and release to fire. Heavy fish are worth more points, but take longer to reel in. Stay on the lookout for the shark, there is a warning sound before he shows up and is worth big points, if you can catch him. If you can't, he will devour all fish his path.

- Easy and intuitive controls for young ones.
- Bright and colorful graphics.
- Simple and fun game play.
- 3 different powerups to help you score big points.
- Quick arcade style game play with no in app purchases.
